label.@value: Situation

comment.@value: Group of people involved in the event having common characteristics and/or status.

comment.@value: An identifiable versioned instance of a single record/element within a situation.

label.@value: Operator action

label.@value: Roadside assistance

label.@value: Construction works

label.@value: Maintenance vehicles

label.@value: Transit information

comment.@value: The availability of transit services and information relating to their departures. This is limited to those transit services which are of direct relevance to road users, e.g. connecting rail or ferry services.

label.@value: Abnormal traffic

comment.@value: A traffic condition which is not normal.

label.@value: Equipment or system fault

label.@value: Traffic element

comment.@value: Authority initiated operation or activity that could disrupt traffic.

label.@value: Disturbance activity

label.@value: Public event

label.@value: Road surface conditions

label.@value: Conditions

label.@value: Poor environment conditions

comment.@value: Any environmental conditions which may be affecting the driving conditions on the road.

label.@value: Weather related road conditions

comment.@value: Road surface conditions that are related to the weather which may affect the driving conditions, such as ice, snow or water.

label.@value: Accident

comment.@value: Accidents are events where one or more vehicles are involved in collisions or in leaving the roadway. These include collisions between vehicles or with other road users or obstacles.

label.@value: Environmental obstruction

label.@value: Obstruction

label.@value: Vehicle obstruction

comment.@value: An obstruction on the road caused by one or more vehicles.
